casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Bertha E. ROBIE, Defendant-Appellant. No. 245. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 18, 1930. Herbert W. Blake, of Gardner, Mass., and Daniel L. Strauss, of Newark, N. J., for appellant. Harry B. Amey, of Burlington, Vt., foi the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
